level.text: The Council shall ensure that the District's one-stop delivery system under the Federal Act is the foundation of local service delivery to employers and participants.
One-stop partners shall include the Income Maintenance Administration, Office of Early Childhood Development, and the Medicaid program.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 17-353 validated a previously made technical correction by substituting "Council" for "Board".

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 13-150
level.text: For Law 13-150, see notes following ยง 32-1601.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 17-353
level.text: For Law 17-353, see notes following ยง 32-101.
